page.title: 20Transport Survey Bourne End
page.content: As both interviewees commented on the amount and noise of traffic in the village we decided to do a survey for 1 hour from 2 p.m. on a mid week after -noon,a time we thought might not be too busy.This is what we found. {A.41} north bound south bound Cars 485 500 Lorries 115 75 Coaches 2 3 Vans 86 84 Motor bikes 19 11 {RAILWAY} Pass.trains 6 5 Goods trains 2 1 {CONCLUSION} As this was an off peak period we felt that living near the road would be very noisy and dangerous at busy times We also visited the A.41 when it was raining and we got covered with mud and water from the lorries.
